recipes.name: Eggplant ğŸ† ğŸ† ğŸ† With Raw Garlic ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„
recipes.notes:
267 75 841 385 _Roasted Eggplant    (Aubergine) Spread_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 medium eggplant  

2 red bell peppers , seeded

1 red onion , peeled

2 garlic  cloves, minced

3 tablespoons olive    oil

1 12 teaspoons salt 

1 tablespoon tomato    paste


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat    the oven to 400 degrees F.

Cut the eggplant , bell pepper , and onion    into 1-inch cubes.

Toss them in a large bowl with the garlic , olive    oil, salt .

Spread them on a baking sheet; roast for 45 minutes, until the vegetables are lightly browned and soft, tossing once during cooking.

Cool slightly.

Place the vegetables in a food processor fitted with a steel blade, add the tomato    paste, and pulse 3 or 4 times to blend.

It should still have a lot of texture left, and not completely pureed.

Taste for salt .

Serve

ingredients: Begin by preparing the mangoes. Cut the mangoes into small cubes and place them into a mixing bowl.
Remove the seeds and membrane from the achali pepper and chop it finely. Add it to the bowl with the mangoes.
Dice the red bell pepper and jalapeno pepper and add them to the bowl.
Finely chop the red onion and add it to the bowl as well.
Wash and chop the cilantro and add it to the bowl.
Squeeze the juice of one lime over the ingredients in the bowl.
Season with salt and pepper to taste. Mix all the ingredients well.
For a spicier salsa, you can add more jalapeno or achali pepper to the mixture.
Let the salsa sit for 15-20 minutes to allow the flavors to combine.
Serve with your favorite traditional dish.

ingredients: cup of green beans , cut into bite-sized pieces
Rinse the samp under cold water    and let it soak in water    for at least 2 hours or overnight. Once soaked, drain the water     and set aside.
In a large pot , heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onion    and minced garlic    and cook until the onion    becomes translucent.
Add the cumin seeds, coriander seeds, turmeric     powder, garam masala, curry powder, and salt  to the pot. Stir and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Pour in the can of chopped tomatoes    and vegetable broth. Mix well and bring to a boil.
Add the soaked samp to the pot and stir. Lower the heat    to a simmer and let it cook for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.

After 30 minutes, add the diced red and yellow bell peppers , carrots , potatoes , zucchini, and green beans  to the pot. Mix well and let it cook for another 20 minutes or until the vegetables are tender.
Once the vegetables are cooked, taste the curry and adjust the seasoning if needed.
Serve the hot , garnished with fresh cilantro (if using).

Enjoy this hearty and flavorful dish. This curry is also great for meal prep and can be stored in the fridge for up to 3 days. Feel free to add in any extra vegetables or protein of your choice to make this dish even more nutritious and delicious.

ingredients: _Mango Coconut Overnight Oats with Vegan Yogurt_
cup coconut milk (or any plant-based milk)
Optional toppings sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix together the rolled oats, coconut milk, and vegan yogurt until well combined.
Add in the diced mango, chia seeds, and shredded coconut. Stir well to evenly distribute all the ingredients.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or transfer the mixture into an airtight container.
Place the bowl or container in the refrigerator and let the oats soak overnight, or for at least 6-8 hours.
In the morning, give the oats a quick stir. If the mixture is too thick, you can add more coconut milk or water to achieve your desired consistency.
Transfer the oat mixture into serving bowls or jars. Top with sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and a drizzle of honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
Enjoy your delicious and nutritious for a quick and easy breakfast or snack option.
You can use any type of vegan yogurt for this recipe, such as almond or coconut yogurt.
If you prefer a sweeter taste, you can add a bit more honey or maple syrup to the oats before soaking overnight.
The chia seeds and shredded coconut add extra fiber and healthy fats, but you can omit them if desired.
For a tropical twist, you can also add some diced pineapple or banana to the oats.
This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled to make multiple servings for meal prep.
You can also use frozen mango if fresh is not available, just make sure to let it thaw before adding it to the oat mixture.

ingredients: Begin by heating the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the onions and garlic to the pot and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the eggplant cubes to the pot and cook until lightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the cumin, paprika, coriander, and turmeric to the pot and stir until the spices are fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
Pour in the vegetable stock and bring the mixture to a gentle boil.
Add the rice and stir to combine.
Reduce the heat and allow the mixture to simmer gently, covered, for 17-20 minutes until the liquid has been absorbed and the rice is cooked.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

recipes.name: Coconut ğŸ¥¥ ğŸ¥¥ ğŸ¥¥ Curry Lentil Soup ğŸ²ğŸ²ğŸ²
ingredients: One cup dried will yield about 4 cups cooked.
Vegetable broth 4-5 cups is usually enough to submerge the lentils as they cook thoroughly.
Carrot, celery stalk, and medium onion.
These aromatic vegetables add a wonderful depth of flavor to the soup.
They also provide a hint of sweetness and freshness that balances out the earthiness of the lentils.
Tomato  adding color to the lentil soup; use fresh chopped tomato, but tomato sauce or tomato paste can also work.
Bay leaves A common ingredient in Italian soups and stews. It adds a subtle herbal note and enhances the overall flavor of the soup.
Sea salt to taste Season generously towards the end.
Extra virgin olive oil For sautÃ©ing the soffritto and for the serving.
Drizzle some high-quality olive oil over the finished soup before serving.
Rinse the lentils thoroughly. This helps remove any impurities and ensures a clean taste.
In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat.
Add the diced onion, carrot, and celery, and sautÃ© until they soften.
Add the rinsed lentils, bay leaf, chopped tomato, and broth to the pot.
Bring to a boil, then let it simmer in a lower heat for about 30-40 minutes, or until the lentils are tender.
Once the lentils are cooked, remove the bay leaf and season the soup with salt.
Ladle the hot soup into bowls and finish with a drizzle of olive oil and fresh basil or parsley.
Serve as a main course with crusty bread or your favorite side dish.
TOP TIPS FOR A DELICIOUS SOUP
Rinse dried lentils well before cooking to remove any dust or debris.
Lentil soup thickens as it sits  add more broth as needed when reheating.
Use vegetable stock to make a vegetarian lentil soup.
Veggie power Add more vegetables to the mix.
Zucchini, swiss chard, bell peppers, baby spinach, or fresh kale can be excellent additions to boost the nutritional value.
Creamy soup If you prefer a creamier texture, blend a portion of the cooked soup using an immersion or regular blender.
Pour it back into the pot and stir to combine.
Add Pasta Its something nice to do with leftovers the next day.
Cook the pasta directly in the lentils, adding about 2 cups of water. Serve with a sprinkle of parmesan cheese.
If you have leftovers or want to make a big batch of Italian lentil soup ahead of time, heres how you can store it
Fridge Allow the soup to cool completely before transferring it to an airtight container.
It will stay fresh in the refrigerator for 4-5 days.
Freeze If you want to extend the soups shelf life, freezing is the way to go.
Portion the soup into freezer-safe containers or resealable freezer bags, leaving some room for expansion. It can be frozen for three months.
Thaw in the refrigerator overnight before reheating.
DO YOU SOAK THE LENTILS BEFORE COOKING
No, you dont need to soak the lentils before cooking.
_Unlike some other legumes, lentils cook relatively quickly without pre-soaking. Just give them a good rinse before putting them in the pot._
CAN I USE CANNED LENTILS INSTEAD OF DRY
While dried lentils are preferred for their texture and flavor, you can certainly use canned lentils if youre short on time or like the convenience.
Drain and rinse the canned lentils before adding them to the soup. Remember that canned lentils are already cooked, so youre the cooking time to avoid overcooking them.
CAN I USE OTHER TYPES OF LENTILS
Yes While the recipe calls for dried lentils, you can experiment with different types, such as green lentils, brown, or black.
Red tomatoes, or a can of tomatoes
cups of Vegetable broth as needed
_Rinse the lentils and drain and dice the carrot, celery, and onion._
In a high-sided pot, sautÃ© the diced carrot, celery and onion.
_When they are golden brown, add the diced tomato, basil leaves, and bay leaf which will give the dish an excellent aroma._
Cook for about 3 minutes, and at this point, add the drained lentils.
_Cook for a couple of minutes and add the broth._
Continue cooking with the lid on. If the lentil soup gets too dry, add more broth.
_Once the lentils are cooked, add salt and pepper to the soup, stir, and serve hot with a drizzle of olive oil and more fresh herbs._
Serve it with garlic bread or croutons. Alternatively, you can add some pasta or rice.
_If you like strong flavors, you can add a pinch of Chili Powder, Turmeric, or Ginger to the Lentil Soup._

recipes.name: Tomato Spinach Soup
ingredients: In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook until translucent, about 3 minutes.
Add the minced garlic and sliced mushrooms to the pot. Cook for 5 minutes, until the mushrooms have softened.
Add the quinoa to the pot and stir to combine with the mushrooms. Toast the quinoa for 2-3 minutes, until it starts to lightly brown.
Slowly pour in the vegetable broth, stirring constantly. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for 15 minutes.
After 15 minutes, add the chopped spinach to the pot. Stir to combine and let it continue to cook for another 5 minutes.
Check the quinoa for doneness. If it is still slightly crunchy, add a little more vegetable broth and continue to cook for a few more minutes.
Once the quinoa is fully cooked and the liquid has been absorbed, remove the pot from the heat.
Stir in the grated Parmesan cheese and season with salt and pepper, to taste.
Transfer the risotto to a serving dish and garnish with fresh parsley, if desired.
Serve hot and enjoy your delicious  This dish is packed with protein, fiber, and nutrients from the quinoa, mushrooms, and spinach. Its a perfect vegetarian meal that is both healthy and satisfying.

recipes.name: Tempeh and Vegetable Stir-Fry with Ginger-Soy Sauce
recipes.instructions: 267 75 841 385 What Is Tempeh (and How to Cook It) What is tempeh and how do you cook it Here Im sharing a guide to all things tempeh along with my favorite marinated tempeh recipe. If youre new to tempeh, youre in the right place because I have created a guide to teach you all about tempeh, its health benefits and how to cook it Tempeh square cut into 4x4 cubes. What is Tempeh You may have seen some of my tempeh recipes and wondered what tempeh is. For starters, its a plant-based protein made of cooked soybeans (think edamame) that have been fermented. The fermentation process binds the soybeans into a cakepatty, which is what youll find at your local grocery store. Some varieties of tempeh only include soybeans, but others will contain grains like barley, rice, flax or millet along with the soybeans. What Does Tempeh Taste Like Tempeh on its own has a mild, nutty flavor thats often described as earthy. Like most proteins, it really takes on the flavor of the dish When prepared with marinades or sauces, it absorbs those flavors and the end result is so tasty. Tempeh vs. Tofu Tempeh is related to tofu, but they arent the same thing They are both made from soy, but other than that theyre actually quite different. Tempeh is less processed, fermented and has a stronger flavor and a bit more texture. Tofu is more processed and has a milder flavor with basically no texture Tofu can be blended up into a creamy sauce or soup or can be fried for more texture, but in general it is much smoother than tempeh. I also find tempeh a bit easier to work with because theres minimal prep work. With tofu you have to account for extra time to press it and with tempeh you simply open the package and youre ready to chop and cook Side by side tempeh rectangles. On the left, the tempeh is out of the packaging, on the right is Lightlife tempeh in the packaging. My Favorite Brand of Tempeh Ive tried a ton of different tempeh varieties and Lightlife is definitely my favorite for a few reasons its organic, GMO-free and easy to find in mainstream stores. I gravitate towards the Three Grain variety because it is the mildest in terms of taste, but I like the original as well You can buy tempeh in most major grocery stores and at every health food store. Youll find it in the refrigerated section, usually by the produce or other plant-based proteins. A square of tempeh that has been sliced into long, thin sections. Health Benefits of Tempeh Tempeh is incredibly healthy Not only is it a complete protein, but its a good source of iron, prebiotics, B vitamins and manganese. A 1 cup serving of tempeh has a whopping 31 grams of protein As I mentioned above, tempeh is a fermented food. This fermentation process breaks down phytic acid, which can inhibit mineral absorption. This means the minerals in tempeh are easier to digest and tempeh is also less likely to cause gas or indigestion when compared to other beans. I dont know about you, but less gas and bloating is always a win in my book Cutting Tempeh Three versions of tempeh that have been sliced, cubed, and cut into triangles. There are so many different ways to cut tempeh, but here are my go-to methods Thin slices if Im using tempeh to make my tempeh bacon, blackened tempeh salad or vegan breakfast sandwich I like to cut the tempeh into 14 thick stripsslices. Cubes or triangles if the tempeh is the star of the recipe like in this vegan sweet and sour or tempeh butternut squash bake I like to cut it into cubes or triangles. For cubes, just try to keep cut them into the same sized cubes so they cook evenly. To cut tempeh into triangles, cut the tempeh in half width-wise. Cut each half in a star pattern to get 16 mini triangles per package of tempeh, 32 triangles total. Crumbled crumbled tempeh is a great substitute for recipes that typically have ground meat like these tempeh tacos or this tempeh bolognese sauce. To crumble tempeh, simply break it apart with your hands until you reach a desired consistency, similar to that of ground meat. A close up of tempeh triangles marinating in a maple balsamic glaze. How to Cook Tempeh Packaged tempeh is pre-cooked so you can easily enjoy it right from the package (on sandwiches, salads, etc), but I highly recommend cooking it so that it tastes better. A lot of people suggest steaming the tempeh before marinating or cooking to help remove any bitterness. I honestly dont take the time to do this, but if youd like to try it heres the process. To steam the tempeh, cut it as desired, place in a steamer basket, cover and steam for 10-15 minutes. If you dont have a steamer basket, you can fill a saucepan with 1-2 inches of water and bring it to a boil. Once boiling place the tempeh in the saucepan, cover and reduce heat to a simmer and cook for 10-15 minutes. My favorite way to make tempeh taste amazing is to marinate it You can marinate in the fridge anywhere from one hour to overnight. The longer it marinates the longer the tempeh has time to soak up all the flavors. Im sharing a simple tempeh marinade below made of maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, oil, tamari and garlic. Its a staple recipe in our house Once your tempeh is prepped and marinated, its time to cook it You have a few options. Heres what I recommend Pan sautÃ© I typically sautÃ© my tempeh. Heat 1 Tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the tempeh and cook until golden brown, about 4-5 minutes per side. Bake Baking tempeh is a great hands-off cooking option Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or a silicone mat. Spread the tempeh evenly and bake at 400ÂºF for about 25 minutes or until golden brown. Air fry If you have an air fryer, this is a great option for crispy and delicious tempeh Add the tempeh to the basket and bake at 375ÂºF for about 15 minutes. Toss every 5 minutes for even cooking. Marinated tempeh thats finished cooking in a large skillet. How to Serve This Marinated Tempeh This marinated tempeh is lovely served over rice or another grain like quinoa or millet. You can also serve it on cauliflower rice for a low-carb option. You can also pair it with a veggie side like my roasted broccoli or kale salad or try it in my tempeh bowls with pumpkin rice. This easy marinated tempeh is my favorite way to cook tempeh. The maple balsamic sauce gives the tempeh so much flavor Prep Time 1hour hour Cook Time 12minutes minutes Total Time 1hour hour 12minutes minutes Servings 6 Ingredients 1x 2x 3x 2 8 oz packages tempeh Â¼ cup maple syrup Â¼ cup balsamic vinegar 2 teaspoons avocado , or olive oil 3 Tablespoons low sodium tamari, soy sauce or coconut aminos 3 cloves garlic, minced 1 Tablespoon avocado or olive oil, for cooking Remove tempeh from package and chop into small triangles by cutting the tempeh in half width-wise. Cut each half in a star pattern to get 16 mini triangles per package of tempeh, 32 triangles total. In a small bowl combine maple syrup, balsamic vinegar, tamari, 2 teaspoons oil and minced garlic. Add tempeh triangles into a shallow dish with a large surface area, pour maple balsamic marinade over the tempeh, toss to coat and let tempeh marinate in the fridge for 1 24 hours. Stir the mixture a couple times while marinating, if possible. Pan-glaze the tempeh by heating 1 Tablespoon avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once oil is hot, add the tempeh (without pouring the marinade in) and cook until golden brown on each side, allowing 4-5 minutes per side. Pour the maple balsamic marinade into the pan with the tempeh and simmer another 5-7 minutes, or until the sauce has reduced creating a glaze on the tempeh. Toss the tempeh a couple times during this process. Once the sauce has thickened and all tempeh pieces are coated, the tempeh is ready to be served. I recommend serving it over rice, cauliflower rice or another grain and a veggie side. 267 75 841 385 _How is tempeh made step by step_ Steps 1 Soaking. Rinse the beans well and soak them for at least 10 hours. ... 2 Cooking. For SOYA, cook for 30 to 40 minutes. ... 3 Drying. ... 4 Tempeh starter and vinegar. ... 5 Containerization. ... 6 Fermentation. ... 7 Remove the heat source. ... 8 Tempeh is ready 267 75 841 385 httpsyoutu.beaQLqCVGgp-Msii-0um1dL2m3hPgVP 267 75 841 385 httpsyoutu.beOxG_S0Q-bAgsiVxDKqlfY6flQf8mQ 263 73 469 4998 Media omitted 263 77 783 4677 Munogarepi 267 73 183 773 Media omitted 267 73 183 773 Media omitted 267 73 183 773 Media omitted

ingredients: Start by washing and dicing the apple into small pieces.
In a mixing bowl, combine the oats, diced apple, cinnamon, milk, and honey. Stir well until all the ingredients are evenly mixed.

Note You can also heat up the oatmeal in the microwave or on the stovetop if you prefer a warm breakfast. Adjust the amount of honey or cinnamon to taste. This recipe can also be made in larger batches for meal prep. Simply multiply the ingredients accordingly and store in separate containers for ready-to-eat breakfast throughout the week.

ingredients: _Tomato and Okra Gumbo with SautÃ©ed Onions_
Begin by preparing all the vegetables. Wash and cut the okra into 1-inch pieces, dice the tomatoes, and slice the onions.
In a large pot, heat 2 tablespoons of olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the sliced onions and sautÃ© for 3-4 minutes until they start to become translucent.
Add the diced tomatoes to the pot and stir. Let it cook for 5 minutes until the tomatoes start to break down and become sauce-like.
Add the okra to the pot and season with salt, black pepper, garlic powder, dried thyme, dried oregano, and bay leaf. Stir to combine all the ingredients.
Pour the vegetable broth over the vegetables and bring the mixture to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium and let it simmer for 20 minutes.

While the gumbo is simmering, prepare the sautÃ©ed onions. Heat the remaining 2 tablespoons of olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the remaining sliced onions and cook for 5-6 minutes until they are caramelized and golden brown.
Once the gumbo has finished simmering, remove the bay leaf and check for seasoning. Adjust if needed.
To serve, ladle the gumbo into bowls and top with the sautÃ©ed onions.
Enjoy your delicious , a hearty and flavorful dish that is perfect for any occasion.

267 75 841 385 _Indian Spiced Rice   _


Ingredients Required
__________

1 tablespoon canola oil or 1 tablespoon vegetable oil

1 cup chopped onion    

1 tablespoon minced fresh ginger root    

1 clove garlic , minced

12 teaspoon coriander powder

12 teaspoon ground cardamom

12 teaspoon ground cumin

1 14 cups uncooked basmati rice or 1 14 cups jasmine rice or 1 14 cups long-grain rice    

34 teaspoon salt  

12 cup dry lentils

3 cups water     

1 medium potato , peeled and diced

1 green bell peppers or 1 red bell pepper , chopped

12 cup green peas    

3 tablespoons raisins


Directions to Prepare
__________

In a large skillet or saucepan, heat    the oil over medium heat .

Add the onions , and cook, stirring frequently until they have softened.

Sprinkle in the ginger , garlic , coriander, cardamom, and cumin.

Cook for 3 minutes more, stirring frequently.

Add the rice    to the saucepan and saute the rice    with the spices for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.

Now add the lentils and salt  into the saucepan.

Add 3 cups of water     into the pan, stir.

Place the potatoes    into the pan.

Bring the mixture to a boil , cover the pan and turn the heat    to low.

Cook for 10 minutes.

Place the bell pepper , peas , and raisins into the saucepan.

Stir well, then cover the pan again.

Cook 10 minutes more, or until the rice , potatoes , and lentils are tender.

Serve hot    and enjoy.

ingredients: _This hearty and comforting Vegan Shepherds Pie is packed with savory lentils, flavorful vegetables, and a creamy mashed potato    topping. Perfect for a cozy dinner_
Â½ cup plant-based milk    (almond, oat, or soy-free option)
tbsp vegan butter or olive    oil
Â½ cups cooked lentils (or 1 can, drained and rinsed)
tbsp soy sauce (or coconut    aminos for soy-free)

_Prepare the Mashed Potatoes Boil the potatoes in a large pot of salted  water     for about 15 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain and mash with plant-based milk , vegan butter , salt , pepper, and garlic    powder. Set aside._

_Cook the FillingHeat olive    oil in a large pan over medium heat. SautÃ© onions , carrots , and celery for about 5 minutes. Add garlic  and mushrooms , and cook for another 3 minutes until softened. Stir in the cooked lentils, tomato    paste, soy sauce, thyme, paprika, salt , and pepper. Pour in vegetable broth and let simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in the frozen peas    and corn , then remove from heat ._
_Transfer the filling to a baking dish and spread evenly._

ingredients: Optional toppings croutons, grated parmesan cheese, and chopped fresh herbs for garnish
Begin by preparing the vegetables. Peel and dice the onion  and garlic  cloves. Wash and roughly chop the spinach  leaves. Peel the potatoes  and cut them into bite-sized cubes.
In a large pot, heat the olive  oil over medium heat. Add the diced onions  and cook for 2-3 minutes until they become translucent. Then, add in the minced garlic  and cook for another minute.
Add the chopped potatoes  to the pot and stir to combine with the onion  and garlic . Let the potatoes  cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Pour in the vegetable broth and bring it to a boil. Lower the heat to a simmer and let the vegetables cook for 20 minutes, or until the potatoes  are fork-tender.

Once the potatoes  are cooked, turn off the heat and let the soup cool for a few minutes. Then, using an immersion blender, blend the soup    until it becomes smooth and creamy. If you do not have an immersion blender, carefully transfer the soup to a traditional blender and blend until smooth.
After blending, return the soup    to the pot and place it back on the stove over low heat. Stir in the chopped spinach  and let it cook for 2-3 minutes until the spinach  has wilted.
Lastly, add the heavy cream to the pot and stir until fully incorporated. Let the soup simmer for another 2-3 minutes and season with salt  to taste.
Serve the hot , with optional toppings such as croutons, grated parmesan cheese, and chopped fresh herbs for added texture and flavor.

Enjoy a warm and comforting bowl of this delicious that is perfect for a vegetarian meal. This soup is packed with nutrients from the spinach and potatoes, making it a healthy and hearty option for any day of the week.

 _Heat    3 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat ._

recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Black    Beans    and Rice   _


Ingredients Required
__________

1 can black beans    (and liquid)

1 medium onion , finely chopped

3 cloves garlic , minced

1 tomato , coarsely chopped

1 tablespoon olive    oil

12 teaspoon ground cumin

1 tablespoon dried oregano, crushed

12 teaspoon cinnamon

your favorite hot    sauce

1 cup uncooked rice    

2 cups water    

1 tablespoon oil (optional) 

Directions to Prepare
__________

Start the water    boiling in a fairly large pot.

 When it boils, add the rice .

 Stir for the first minute, then cover and turn the heat    as low as possible.

 Rice  should only cook for 20 minutes; youll get perfect white rice every time by following a 21 rice-water ratio and following these directions.

 Heat a saucepan slightly, then add oil and heat    that briefly as well (this prevents sticking).

 Saute the onion    until aromatic, then add garlic ; dont brown.

 Turn the heat    down to medium low.

 Dump the whole can of beans    in.

 Add the vinegar, spices and chopped tomato , stir, and let simmer, covered.

 When rice    is done (20 minutes), remove from heat .

 Serve  beans    over rice .

recipes.name: Cabbage Onion and Potato Soup
ingredients: _Mango Coconut Overnight Oats with Vegan Yogurt_
cup coconut milk (or any plant-based milk)
Optional toppings sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix together the rolled oats, coconut milk, and vegan yogurt until well combined.
Add in the diced mango, chia seeds, and shredded coconut. Stir well to evenly distribute all the ingredients.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or transfer the mixture into an airtight container.
Place the bowl or container in the refrigerator and let the oats soak overnight, or for at least 6-8 hours.
In the morning, give the oats a quick stir. If the mixture is too thick, you can add more coconut milk or water to achieve your desired consistency.
Transfer the oat mixture into serving bowls or jars. Top with sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and a drizzle of honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
Enjoy your delicious and nutritious for a quick and easy breakfast or snack option.
You can use any type of vegan yogurt for this recipe, such as almond or coconut yogurt.
If you prefer a sweeter taste, you can add a bit more honey or maple syrup to the oats before soaking overnight.
The chia seeds and shredded coconut add extra fiber and healthy fats, but you can omit them if desired.
For a tropical twist, you can also add some diced pineapple or banana to the oats.
This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled to make multiple servings for meal prep.
You can also use frozen mango if fresh is not available, just make sure to let it thaw before adding it to the oat mixture.

ingredients: Begin by heating olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add diced onion and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Cut the okra into 1-inch pieces and add them to the pot. Cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add in the seasoning and stir until the okra is evenly coated.
Cut the tomatoes into small chunks and add them to the pot. Cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Cut the onion  into bite-sized pieces and add them to the pot. Cook.
Pour in the vegetable broth and stir well. Season with salt to taste.
Increase the heat to high and bring the mixture to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

267 73 183 773 _Carrot    Rice   with Peanuts   _


Ingredients Required
__________

1 cup long-grain rice   or 1 cup basmati rice   

2 cups water    

14 cup roasted peanuts 

1 onion , sliced thinly

1 teaspoon ginger root , minced

34 cup grated carrot    

salt  

pepper  

cilantro, to garnish (optional)


Directions to Prepare
__________

Combine rice   and water      in a medium saucepan.

Bring to a boil    over high heat.

Reduce heat    to low, cover with lid, and allow to steam until tendercooked (about 20 minutes).

While rice   is cooking, pulverize peanuts    in a blender and set aside.

Saute onions    until golden brown.

Stir in ginger , carrots , and salt  to taste.

Reduce heat    to low and cover to steam 5 minutes.

Stir in pepper  and peanuts .

When rice   is done, add it to the skillet and stir gently to combine with other ingredients.

Garnish with chopped cilantro and serve  hot .

recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Roasted Eggplant    (Aubergine) Spread_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 medium eggplant  

2 red bell peppers , seeded

1 red onion , peeled

2 garlic  cloves, minced

3 tablespoons olive    oil

1 12 teaspoons salt 

1 tablespoon tomato    paste


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat    the oven to 400 degrees F.

Cut the eggplant , bell pepper , and onion    into 1-inch cubes.

Toss them in a large bowl with the garlic , olive    oil, salt .

Spread them on a baking sheet; roast for 45 minutes, until the vegetables are lightly browned and soft, tossing once during cooking.

Cool slightly.

Place the vegetables in a food processor fitted with a steel blade, add the tomato    paste, and pulse 3 or 4 times to blend.

It should still have a lot of texture left, and not completely pureed.

Taste for salt .

Serve

Serve with a side of your favorite vegetables, or enjoy as is.

ingredients: Start by washing and dicing the apple into small pieces.
In a mixing bowl, combine the oats, diced apple, cinnamon, milk, and honey. Stir well until all the ingredients are evenly mixed.
If desired, add chia seeds to the mixture for extra nutrition and texture.
Pour the mixture into a Mason jar or any airtight container.
Cover and refrigerate overnight, or for at least 4-6 hours.
In the morning, take the oatmeal out of the fridge and give it a good stir.
If the oatmeal is too thick, you can add a splash of milk to thin it out.
Top with chopped nuts for some crunch and extra protein.
_Enjoy your delicious and nutritious for breakfast, or as a quick and easy snack._

Note You can also heat up the oatmeal in the microwave or on the stovetop if you prefer a warm breakfast. Adjust the amount of honey or cinnamon to taste. This recipe can also be made in larger batches for meal prep. Simply multiply the ingredients accordingly and store in separate containers for ready-to-eat breakfast throughout the week.

Vegetarian Spinach and Tofu Stir-Fry
ingredients: Cooked rice      or traditional meal, for serving
While the mince is rehydrating, chop the onions , garlic , and mushrooms  into small pieces.
In a large pan or skillet, heat the olive  oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onions  and garlic , and cook until softened and fragrant.
Add the mushrooms  to the pan and continue cooking until they have softened and released their juices.
Remove the mushrooms , onions , and garlic  from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, melt the butter over medium heat. Add the rehydrated soya mince and cook for a few minutes until it starts to brown.
Pour the vegetable broth into the pan and stir well, scraping up any bits stuck to the bottom.
Add the cooked mushrooms , onions , and garlic  back into the pan with the soya mince. Stir in the salt  to taste.
Allow the mixture to simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the liquid has reduced and the flavors have melded together.
Stir in the sour cream until well combined. Let the stroganoff cook for an additional 5 minutes.
Serve the stroganoff over cooked rice or traditional meal and garnish with fresh parsley, if desired.

This is a delicious and hearty vegetarian meal that is sure to satisfy. The combination of rehydrated soya mince and earthy mushrooms creates a rich and flavorful dish that is perfect for a cozy dinner at home. Serve it over your choice of rice or traditional meal for a complete meal.

recipes.name: Creamy Spinach and Potato Soup ğŸ²ğŸ²ğŸ²
recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Soya Chunks and Spinach_

_Ingredients_

- 200g soya chunks

- 2 tablespoons olive oil

- 1 onion, diced

- 2 cloves garlic, minced

- 2 carrots, diced

- 1 teaspoon of ground cumin

- 2 cups of vegetable stock

- 1 cup long grain rice

- 2 cups spinach

- Salt to taste

_Method_

1. Soak the soya chunks in water for 10 minutes then drain and set aside.

2. Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, and carrots and cook until softened.

3. Add the cumin and cooked soya chunks and sautÃ© for 1 minute.

4. Add the vegetable stock and rice and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes.

5. Add the spinach and season with salt. Stir to combine and cook for 2 minutes more.

6. Serve and enjoy

recipes.name: MEALS
ingredients: Prepare the soya chunks by soaking them in hot water for 10 minutes. Drain and squeeze out excess water    from the chunks. Set aside.
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat    and add in the vegetable oil.
Finely chop the garlic    cloves and dice the onion    and red bell pepper .
Add the chopped garlic    to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add in the diced onion    and bell pepper    and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Add in the prepared soya chunks and continue stir-frying for 3-4 minutes until they start to turn slightly golden.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Pour this mixture over the soya chunks and vegetables in the pan.
Continue stir-frying for another 2-3 minutes until the soya chunks are fully coated in the sauce and the vegetables are tender.
Remove from heat and serve hot . You can enjoy this dish on its own as a protein-packed meal or serve it with rice or traditional meal for a more filling meal.
bell peppers , deseeded and diced (the colorful the better)
Stir fry onions  (1 minute), then garlic  (20 seconds).
Then add peppers  and mushrooms . Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft, (about 2 minutes).
Add the soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes.
When done, remove from heat    and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve.

recipes.name: Soya Mince Stir Fry with Broccoli ğŸ¥¦ ğŸ¥¦ ğŸ¥¦ and Carrots ğŸ¥• ğŸ¥• ğŸ¥•
ingredients: Begin by pressing the tofu. Place the block of tofu on a plate lined with paper towels and cover the top with more paper towels. Place a heavy object, such as a cast iron skillet, on top of the tofu to help press out any excess moisture. Let it sit for 15 minutes while you prepare the vegetables.
Wash and chop the bell peppers, zucchini, carrot, and onion into bite-sized pieces. Mince the garlic and grate the ginger.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, sesame oil, cornstarch, chili flakes, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Set aside.
Heat a large wok or non-stick pan over medium-high heat and add enough vegetable oil to cover the bottom of the pan.

Carefully place the tofu in the hot oil and cook for 2-3 minutes on each side, until crispy and golden brown. Remove the tofu from the pan and place it on a plate lined with paper towels to absorb any excess oil.
In the same pan, add the minced garlic and grated ginger. Cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the chopped vegetables to the pan and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes, until they begin to soften.
Pour the sauce mixture over the vegetables and stir to coat evenly. Cook for an additional 2-3 minutes until the sauce thickens and coats the vegetables.
Add the crispy tofu back into the pan and toss to combine with the vegetables and sauce. Cook for another 1-2 minutes until everything is heated through.
Serve the over cooked rice and enjoy You can also top with extra chili flakes or sesame seeds for added flavor.

267 73 183 773 Healthy Low-Fat Black Bean Veggie Burgers      


Ingredients Required
__________

1 12-2 tablespoons pureed onions    (green onions optional)

1 cup black beans, well drained

1 -3 tablespoon whole wheat flour

1 slice of whole wheat bread , very well crumbled

1 -1 12 teaspoon crushed garlic    

12 teaspoon onion    powder

14 teaspoon seasoning salt  

oil (for frying)


Directions to Prepare
__________

_In a large bowl, mash the beans until almost smooth (or puree with the onions )._

_Add onions    and the rest of the ingredients, except the oil, adding the flour a tablespoon at a time until the mixture is at your desired consistency._

_Form bean mixture into flat patties and fry patties in a small amount of oil until slightly firm._

Serve  topped with hummus or a Greek feta salad    salad dressing, spread on a whole wheat bun. Try these with ketchup.

267 73 183 773 _Pumpkin    Biscuits_


Ingredients Required
__________

2 eggs    

12 cup canned  mashed pumpkin

12 teaspoon salt  

2 tablespoons powdered soya milk    

2 12 cups flour (wheat is probably better)

water    


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.

 Blend eggs    and pumpkin together; add salt , powdered soya milk  , and flour.

Add water      as needed to make the dough somewhat workable.

The dough should be dry and stiff, dont be concerned with crumbs being left in the bowl.

You will need to mix this with your hands because it is too stiff for an electric mixer.

 Roll to 12-inch thick.

 Cut into shapes.

Place 1 apart on ungreased cookie sheet.

Bake for 20 minutes on one side, then turn over and bake another 20 minutes.

Serve

ingredients: _Spicy Beetroot and Carrot Salad with Cumin and Coriander_
g beetroot, peeled and cut into thin strips
g carrot, peeled and cut into thin strips
In a small pan, toast the cumin and coriander seeds over medium heat until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and crush the seeds using a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder.
In a mixing bowl, combine the crushed seeds with minced garlic, olive oil, honey, and apple cider vinegar. Whisk until well combined.
Add the beetroot and carrot strips to the dressing and toss to coat evenly. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours, in the refrigerator.
In a separate bowl, toss the mixed salad greens with a pinch of salt and pepper.
To assemble the salad, place the marinated beetroot and carrot strips on top of the mixed greens. Garnish with sliced red chili for an extra kick of heat.
Serve as a side dish or as a light lunch.
Enjoy the spicy, tangy flavors of the beetroot and carrot salad with cumin and coriander.

recipes.notes:
267 75 841 385 _Cauliflower, Pea    and Potato    Curry_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 large cauliflower, cut into small florets

2 large onions , chopped 

3 medium baking potatoes , chopped 

1 cup frozen green pea    

1 cup vegetable stock 

4 tablespoons olive     oil 

2 tablespoons fresh ginger , grated (including juice)

5 garlic  cloves, minced

2 teaspoons turmeric

2 teaspoons ground coriander

1 teaspoon salt 

1 teaspoon fenugreek seeds

1 teaspoon ground cumin

1 teaspoon cumin seed

12 lemon , juice of

13 cup fresh cilantro, chopped


Directions to Prepare
__________

Heat    oil in a large wok, karahi, or deep nonstick pan over high heat . Add onions    and cumin seeds, and cook until onions    are translucent. Then add the minced garlic , chunks of ginger  . SautÃ© for 2 minutes, stirring frequently.

Add all remaining spices, including salt . Stir well.

Immediately add potato    to pan. Stir until coated in oil and spices. Turn heat    down to medium and sautÃ© potato    for 3-5 minutes, stirring frequently.

Add  vegetable stock, then put lid on pan, lower heat to medium-low and simmer for around 15 minutes.

Add the cauliflower florets, grated ginger    and lemon    juice. Stir well. Replace lid, turn heat    to low, and let simmer for about 10 minutes. If the ingredients are sticking to the pan, you can add a bit more stock or 14 cup of water    at this point.

_Add frozen peas    to pan, and stir ingredients. Cover and simmer for 10 more minutes._

Turn off heat . Add half of the fresh cilantro, and mix thoroughly. Replace the lid, then allow to rest for 10 minutes before adjusting salt  to taste and serving dish over rice. Garnish with remaining fresh cilantro.

recipes.name: Cauliflower and Potatoes ğŸ¥” ğŸ¥” ğŸ¥”
ingredients: Peel and chop the sweet potatoes into small cubes.
In a pot, bring 1 cup of water to a boil. Add the sweet potatoes and cook for 10 minutes or until tender.
In a separate pot, combine the groundnut butter, groundnut milk, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, and ground ginger. Cook on medium heat, stirring constantly, for 5 minutes.
Add the cooked sweet potatoes to the groundnut mixture and mash them with a potato masher until well incorporated.
Gradually stir in the honey, shredded coconut, and chopped almonds. Cook for an additional 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the porridge thickens.
Remove from heat and let it cool for a few minutes.
Serve the warm in bowls. Top with additional shredded coconut and chopped almonds, if desired.

African-inspired porridge for breakfast or as a warm and comforting snack. The combination of sweet potatoes and groundnut butter provides a good balance of carbohydrates, protein, and healthy fats, making this porridge a satisfying and filling meal.
_Experiment with different spices and toppings to make it your own._
spicy vegetarian sausages, sliced into discs

_Heat the olive    oil with the onions , chili    powder and garlic    in a large cast iron skillet, when they get fragrant, add the sausage discs. Toss together. After a few minutes, add the rice    and stir fry for a three minutes. Turn off the heat    and mix in the flax seeds and salt. Put aside._

Lobotomize the pumpkins   cut the tops off (if you cut in a zig-zag, its easier to put it back on later), scoop out the seeds and stringy stuff inside. If you want to roast the seeds (totally advisable), rinse them off and set aside. Pack the stuffing inside the pumpkins, replace tops. Put the pumpkins on a baking sheet in the preheated oven, and cover with tinfoil or an additional baking sheet inverted. Pop in the oven, check after 20 minutes, check after an additional 10-20 minutes. Pumpkins are done when they are slightly soft, and slightly brown. Serve  with the lids on, and let eaters open them.

recipes.notes:
267 75 841 385 _Red Split Lentils With Cabbage (Masoor Dal Aur Band Gobi)_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 14 cups  split red lentils (masoor dal)

5 cups water      

12 teaspoon ground turmeric     

5 tablespoons vegetable oil

1 teaspoon cumin seed

2 -4 garlic    cloves, peeled and finely chopped

1 medium onion , peeled and cut into fine slices

12 lb cabbage, cored and finely shredded

1 -2 hot green chili pepper , seeded and finely sliced

1 12 teaspoons salt  

1 medium tomato , peeled (or not)

12 teaspoon fresh ginger , peeled and finely grated


Directions to Prepare
__________

Pick over, wash, and drain the lentils.

In a heavy-bottomed pot , bring the lentils and water     to a boil, skimming off any scum that rises to the top. Stir in the turmeric. Cover pot , with lid slightly ajar, and simmer over low heat   , stirring occasionally.

While the lentils are cooking, heat    the oil in a frying pan    over medium heat . Add the cumin seeds and cook for 3 to 4 seconds, then add the garlic . Once the garlic    pieces start to brown, add the onion , cabbage and green chilies. Cook the cabbage mixture, stirring often, until it starts to brown. Stir in 14 teaspoon salt . recipes.name: Welcome to Healthy By Nature (HBN) vegetarian kitchen
ingredients: _Basic (but very good) granola requires just a handful of ingredients_ rolled oats, a sweetener, some cooking oil, and maybe nuts or dried fruit. Once you master that basic formula, its easy to customize a mix for your own preferences.

What every granola-loving home cook needs is a simple, straightforward recipe that can be memorized and made from heart. This recipe is just that  a very basic granola that will teach you the basics of cooking oats with a little sweetener, seasoning, and a few additions. Our formula uses seven ingredients.

Once youre comfortable with this basic recipe, youre ready to experiment. Swap in cashews, hazelnuts, or pistachios. Dice some dried apricots, dates, or figs. Try cardamom or allspice instead of cinnamon. The variations are almost endless.

Keep it 50-50. The coating for your granola should be about half sweetener and half oil. Honey and maple syrup are two of the best sweeteners you can use for granola because their liquid state coats each oat well. This recipe will give you granola with a familiar level of sweetness, but you can reduce the honey and oil by as much as half and still have excellent granola.

Get as clumpy as you like. The internet is littered with tricks for clumpy granola, but you dont need special ingredients for nice, simple chunks  just a few steps. First, press the granola into an even layer before you put it in the oven. Then, stir it only once halfway through cooking. For really good clumps, press down on the finished granola before it cools and avoid jostling it on the pan until cooled completely.

Know when the granola is done. Arguably the hardest part of baking granola is knowing when its done. Using a low oven temperature helps dry out the granola without over-baking it. Keep in mind that the granola wont be dry right out of the oven  it will dry as it cools. So take it out of the oven when it looks lightly toasted and smells like cooked honey.
Were going for a toasty smell here.
Add dried fruit after baking. You can toast most nuts with the oats in the oven, but dried fruit will burn on the pan, so be sure to add it after baking.
For the longest shelf life, completely cool the granola on the pan before transferring to a storage container. When stored in an airtight container, this granola will keep for up to a month.

Eat it like cereal with milk or sprinkle over yogurt for a simple breakfast you can take anywhere. Try this recipe straight up or tweak it slightly using different sweeteners, seasonings, or swapping the nuts or fruit for your favorite. With this simple easy granola, the possibilities are almost endless.
/2 cup neutral oil, such as sunflower or grapeseed
cup raisins or other dried, chopped fruit
Heat the oven to 300F and line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
Arrange a rack in the middle of the oven and heat the oven to 300F.
Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper.
Whisk together the oil, honey, cinnamon, and salt.
Place the oil, honey, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl and whisk to combine.
Add the oats and almonds and stir to coat.
Go ahead and measure the oats and almonds right into the oil mixture  dont worry if you add a little more oats or almonds  granola is very forgiving.
Spread the oats out onto the prepared baking sheet.
Transfer the mixture to the prepared baking sheet and spread into an even layer.
If the granola is clumpy, use a spatula to press it into the pan.
Bake for 20 minutes, stirring halfway through.

Bake, stirring halfway through, for about 20 minutes total. The granola is ready when golden-brown and the almonds have toasted  it will still feel wet coming out of the oven but will dry as it cools.
Remove from the oven, add the fruit, tamp down, and cool.
Place the baking sheet on a wire rack and sprinkle on the raisins or fruit. If you want clumps of granola, press and tamp down the granola before it cools, which will help it stick together.
Transfer the cooled granola to an airtight container for long-term storage at room temperature.
_Gluten-free For gluten-free granola, make sure the oats were processed in a gluten-free facility._
Storage Granola can be stored in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 1 month.
_This granola makes a wonderful meal (add your milk of choice and maybe some fresh fruit). It also stores beautifully, so it makes a great homemade gift._
Once you try homemade granola, you wont go back to store-bought granola. Its so much better

This granola recipe is also a far more healthy granola option, since its made with whole grains, unrefined oil and naturally sweetened. You just cant beat freshly baked granola packed with delicious and good-for-you ingredients.
Plus, homemade granola is super easy to make. Youll only need one bowl and some basic pantry ingredients.
Now that you have my base recipe, you can play around with the mix-ins and spices to make it your favorite granola.
By the way, you can preserve that freshly baked flavor by storing this granola in the freezer. Just let it warm to room temperature for a few minutes, and enjoy.
Heart-healthy, hearty, whole-grain old-fashioned oats keep their shape during baking. Be sure to use certified gluten-free oats if you need gluten-free granola.

I used pecans and pepitas (green pumpkin seeds) to make this batch. Other options include walnuts, which are rich in Omega-3s, whole or slivered almonds, cashews, peanuts, pistachios, macadamia nuts and sunflower seeds.
Oil helps make this granola crisp and irresistible. I prefer unrefined coconut oil, which is delicious (you can barely taste the coconut, if at all) and produces the perfect texture.
You can use extra-virgin olive oil instead, if youd like your granola to be a little more on the savory side. If youre watching your saturated fat intake, olive oil is a better choice
I love using real maple syrup in my granola. Honey works great, too. As a bonus, these natural sweeteners infuse your granola extra-delicious flavor that sugar would not.

For flavorful granola, dont skip the salt Too little and your flavors wont sing. I prefer using fine-grain sea salt in this one (I always cook with fine-grain sea salt), but regular salt will do, too (just use a little less).
I added cinnamon to this batch for some subtle warming spice. Ground ginger (use half as much) and pumpkin spice blends are other options.
Dried fruit lends some extra sweetness, chewy texture and irresistible fruity flavor. I used dried cranberries for this batch. I also love tart dried cherries, raisins and chopped dried apricots.
For fresh citrus flavor, stir fresh citrus zest (up to 2 teaspoons) into the mixture before baking. I love adding orange zest, in particular.

ingredients: Begin by preparing the ingredients. Rinse the okra and cut off the tops and bottoms, then slice into 1-inch pieces. Slice the vegetarian sausage into thin rounds. Dice the onion and red bell pepper, and mince the garlic.
In a large pot, heat a drizzle of oil over medium heat. Add the diced onion and cook for 2-3 minutes until softened.
Add the minced garlic and stir for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Next, add the sliced sausage and cook for 5-6 minutes until lightly browned.
Add the diced tomatoes, sliced okra, red bell pepper, and all the spices (cayenne pepper, cumin, salt). Stir well to combine.
Pour in the vegetable broth and bring the soup to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low and let the soup simmer for 20-25 minutes until the okra is tender.
If desired, add cooked rice    to the soup and let them cook for an additional 5-10 minutes.
Serve the hot, garnished with sliced green onions if desired.
Enjoy your warm and flavorful soup

recipes.name: Okra and Tomato Pasta with Caramelized Onion and Garlic Sauce
ingredients: _Okra and Tomato Stew with Caramelized Onions_
Begin by preparing the okra. Wash and dry the okra pods, then trim off the tops and tails. Cut the okra into 1 inch pieces and set aside.
In a large pot, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onions and cook until they are caramelized, about 10-12 minutes. Stir occasionally to prevent burning.
Once the onions are caramelized, add the minced garlic and cook for an additional 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add the okra to the pot and stir to combine with the onions and garlic. Cook for 5-7 minutes, until the okra begins to soften.
Add the tomatoes to the pot, along with the cumin, dried thyme, dried oregano, salt. Stir to combine all the ingredients.
Pour in 1 cup of water and bring the stew to a boil. Once boiling, reduce the heat to low, cover the pot, and let it simmer for 15-20 minutes.
Check the stew occasionally and stir to prevent it from sticking to the bottom of the pot. If the stew is too thick, you can add more water as needed.
Once the okra is tender and the stew has thickened, you can serve it hot, garnished with fresh parsley if desired.

This is a delicious and hearty dish that is perfect for any season. The combination of the okra and tomatoes creates a flavorful base, while the caramelized onions add a touch of sweetness. Serve this stew for a satisfying meal.

recipes.name: MEALS
recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 6 Healthy Homemade Salad      Dressings

_These six healthy salad dressing recipes are easy to make and store in your fridge. Try them all or choose your favorites  balsamic, peanut    ginger, apple   cider vinegar, avocado, raspberry  vinaigrette, and honey  mustard salad    dressing._

_Six colorful jars of homemade salad dressing surrounded with vegetables and fruit._

_6 Healthy Salad    Dressings Overview_

Have you ever wondered how you could make your favorite salad dressings in a healthy, more affordable version This post shares 6 healthy salad      dressing recipes that are packed full of nutrition and easy to make

_These salad    dressing recipes are so simple and easy to make. Once you try a few of these recipes youll quickly learn which ones are your favorites and what dishes youd like to pair them with._

These recipes arent just great for salads  You can use them in quinoa bowls, on top of roasted veggies, pasta dishes, or even as a marinade

_All of these dressings are made with whole natural ingredients that youll feel good about sharing with your family. Each recipe makes about 1 Â½ cups, which is the perfect size to store in 8 oz mason jars._

A jar of apple   cider vinegar dressing with ingredients including olive    oil, apple   cider vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic , salt  and pepper.

1. Apple   Cider Vinegar Salad      Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 cup olive    oil

Â½ cup apple   cider vinegar

Â½ Tbsp dijon mustard

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

DIRECTIONS

Combine 1 cup olive    oil, Â½ cup apple   cider vinegar, Â½ Tbsp dijon mustard, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt  and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar.

_Seal the lid and shake up to mix. This dressing can be stored in the fridge for up to two weeks. Reshake before using again._

A jar of balsamic dressing with ingredients listed including balsamic vinegar, olive    oil, honey , dijon mustard, garlic , salt , pepper.

2. Balsamic Salad     Dressing Recipe

INGREDIENTS

Â¾ cup balsamic vinegar

Â½ cup olive    oil

1 Tbsp honey  or pure maple syrup

1 tsp dijon mustard

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

_DIRECTIONS Combine Â¾ cup balsamic vinegar, Â½ cup olive    oil, 1 Tbsp honey , 1 tsp dijon mustard, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt  and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar._

Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

_A mason jar of peanut    butter dressing with ingredients listed beside peanut    butter, soy sauce, lemon    juice, honey , ginger root , and garlic ._

3. Peanut    Butter    Salad    Dressing

INGREDIENTS

Â½ cup peanut    butter  or almond butter

3 Tbsp soy sauce

2 Tbsp honey   or maple syrup

2 Tbsp lemon    juice

Â½ Tbsp freshly grated ginger    

1 garlic  clove  minced

DIRECTIONS Combine Â½ cup peanut    butter, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 Tbsp honey , 2 Tbsp lemon    juice, Â½ Tbsp freshly grated ginger , and 1 minced garlic  clove together in a container or mason jar. Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

A jar of creamy avocado    dressing with a sliced avocado beside it. Ingredients are listed beside include avocado , cilantro, olive    oil, lime    juice, water , garlic , salt  and pepper.

4. Creamy Avocado    Salad Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 ripe avocado   peeled and pitted

Â½ cup water     

Â½ cup chopped cilantro

Â¼ cup olive    oil

Â¼ cup lime  juice

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

The instructions for this dressing are below

_DIRECTIONS Add 1 ripe avocado , Â½ cup water , Â½ cup chopped cilantro, Â¼ cup olive    oil, Â¼ cup lime  juice, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt , and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper all to a blender and blend until smooth and creamy._

Pour into a container or mason jar. Store in the fridge for up to 3-4 days. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

A jar of honey  mustard salad    dressing and ingredients listed including olive    oil, lemon  juice, dijon mustard, honey  salt  and pepper.

5. Honey  Mustard Salad    Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 cup olive    oil

Â½ cup lemon  juice

2 Tbsp dijon mustard

2 Tbsp honey  

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

DIRECTIONS Combine 1 cup olive    oil, Â½ cup lemon  juice, 2 Tbsp dijon mustard, 2 Tbsp honey , Â½ tsp salt , and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar.

_Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again._

A mason jar of raspberry  vinaigrette with a bowl of fresh raspberries and a list of ingredients including raspberries , olive  oil, lemon  juice, apple   cider vinegar, honey  and salt .

6. Raspberry Vinaigrette

INGREDIENTS

1 cup fresh raspberries

Â¼ cup olive    oil

Â¼ cup lemon  juice

3 Tbsp apple   cider vinegar

1 Tbsp honey  or pure maple syrup

Â¼ tsp salt  

The instructions for this dressing are below

_DIRECTIONS Add 1 cup fresh raspberries, Â¼ cup olive oil, Â¼ cup lemon juice, 3 Tbsp apple cider vinegar, 1 Tbsp honey and Â¼ tsp salt to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour over salad. This dressing is best when served fresh._

recipes.name: Samp and Sweet Potato ğŸ  ğŸ  ğŸ  Fritters
ingredients: cup of mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn)
In a large bowl, combine the mashed potatoes, flour, baking powder, garlic powder, onion powder, dried parsley, salt. Mix well until all the ingredients are fully incorporated.
In a separate bowl, beat the egg and milk together. Pour the mixture into the potato mixture and stir until a thick batter forms.
Add the mixed vegetables into the batter and mix well.
In a large pan, heat vegetable oil over medium-high heat.
Using a spoon or ice cream scooper, drop spoonfuls of the potato and vegetable batter into the hot oil. Flatten the fritters slightly using the back of the spoon.
Fry the fritters for about 2-3 minutes on each side, or until they are golden brown and crispy.
Once cooked, remove the fritters from the pan and place them on a paper towel to absorb any excess oil.
Serve the hot with your choice of dipping sauce, such as ranch dressing or ketchup.
These fritters are a great way to use up leftover mashed potatoes and add some extra veggies into your diet. They make a delicious and satisfying side dish.

267 73 183 773 Healthy Low-Fat Black Bean Veggie Burgers      


Ingredients Required
__________

1 12-2 tablespoons pureed onions    (green onions optional)

1 cup black beans, well drained

1 -3 tablespoon whole wheat flour

1 slice of whole wheat bread , very well crumbled

1 -1 12 teaspoon crushed garlic    

12 teaspoon onion    powder

14 teaspoon seasoning salt  

oil (for frying)


Directions to Prepare
__________

_In a large bowl, mash the beans until almost smooth (or puree with the onions )._

_Add onions    and the rest of the ingredients, except the oil, adding the flour a tablespoon at a time until the mixture is at your desired consistency._

_Form bean mixture into flat patties and fry patties in a small amount of oil until slightly firm._

Serve  topped with hummus or a Greek feta salad    salad dressing, spread on a whole wheat bun. Try these with ketchup.

recipes.name: Pizza ğŸ• ğŸ• ğŸ• Dough for Thin Crust Pizza ğŸ• ğŸ• ğŸ•
recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Pumpkin    Biscuits_


Ingredients Required
__________

2 eggs    

12 cup canned  mashed pumpkin

12 teaspoon salt  

2 tablespoons powdered soya milk    

2 12 cups flour (wheat is probably better)

water    


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.

 Blend eggs    and pumpkin together; add salt , powdered soya milk  , and flour.

Add water      as needed to make the dough somewhat workable.

The dough should be dry and stiff, dont be concerned with crumbs being left in the bowl.

You will need to mix this with your hands because it is too stiff for an electric mixer.

 Roll to 12-inch thick.

 Cut into shapes.

Place 1 apart on ungreased cookie sheet.

Bake for 20 minutes on one side, then turn over and bake another 20 minutes.

Serve

recipes.name: Savory Spinach and Feta Crepes using Whole Wheat Flour
ingredients: _Spicy Beetroot and Carrot Salad with Cumin and Coriander_
g beetroot, peeled and cut into thin strips
g carrot, peeled and cut into thin strips
In a small pan, toast the cumin and coriander seeds over medium heat until fragrant, about 2-3 minutes. Remove from heat and crush the seeds using a mortar and pestle or a spice grinder.
In a mixing bowl, combine the crushed seeds with minced garlic, olive oil, honey, and apple cider vinegar. Whisk until well combined.
Add the beetroot and carrot strips to the dressing and toss to coat evenly. Let it marinate for at least 30 minutes, or up to 2 hours, in the refrigerator.
In a separate bowl, toss the mixed salad greens with a pinch of salt and pepper.
To assemble the salad, place the marinated beetroot and carrot strips on top of the mixed greens. Garnish with sliced red chili for an extra kick of heat.
Serve as a side dish or as a light lunch.
Enjoy the spicy, tangy flavors of the beetroot and carrot salad with cumin and coriander.
recipes.instructions: 267 73 183 773 Beetroot and Cucumber Salad _Ingredients_ - 2 medium beetroots, cooked and diced - 2 large cucumbers, chopped - 2 cups of salad leaves (lettuce, beetroot ,spinach etc.) For the dressing - 2 tablespoons of mayonnaise - 1 tablespoon of lemon juice - 1 tablespoon of olive oil - 14 teaspoon of garlic powder - Salt to taste 1. In a large bowl, mix together the diced beetroot, cucumber and salad leaves. 2. In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, lemon juice, olive oil, garlic powder and salt. 3. Pour the dressing over the salad and toss to combine. 4. Enjoy 267 73 183 773 _Lentils and Rice With Caramelized Onions _ Ingredients Required __________ 14 cup extra virgin olive oil 6 large yellow onions 4 12 cups water 1 14 cups brown lentils 1 14 cups long-grain rice 1 teaspoon salt plain yogurt __________ _Peel and slice onions vertically._ _Heat 3 tablespoons oil in a large skillet over medium-low heat ._ _Add onion ; cover and cook 15 minutes or until soft, stirring occasionally._ _Uncover and increase heat to medium; cook 25 minutes or until golden brown, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to low and keep onions warm._ _While onion cooks, bring water to a boil in a large saucepan._ _Add lentils; return to a boil and reduce heat to keep at a low boil and cook 20 minutes._ _Stir in 12 cup caramelized onion , rice , salt . Cover, and cook over medium-low heat for 25 minutes, until lentils and rice are tender._ _Spoon lentils and rice into a shallow dish; top with remaining onion._ _Drizzle remaining oil over lentils. Serve with yogurt, if desired._ Serve 267 73 183 773 _Spicy Curried Lentils and Rice _ Ingredients Required __________ 2 teaspoons canola oil or 2 teaspoons vegetable oil 1 12 cups onions , chopped 1 teaspoon ginger , finely minced 2 garlic cloves, finely minced 1 small hot pepper , finely minced 1 cup brown lentils or 1 cup green lentil, soaked, rinsed, and drained 12 cup basmati rice or 12 cup other long grain rice 3 cups water or 3 cups broth 1 tablespoon curry powder 12-1 teaspoon salt 1 cup frozen peas , defrosted 1 cup diced tomato (fresh or canned) 3 -4 tablespoons cilantro, chopped for garnish hot sauce or chutney, to taste __________ _Pour the oil into a medium or large saucepan with a lid over medium heat . Add the onion , ginger root , garlic and pepper . SautÃ© for 1 to 2 minutes. Cook until onion begins to slightly soften, about 5 minutes._ _Add lentils, rice , curry powder, and water . Stir well._ _Cover the pan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 35 minutes._ _Remove from heat , add peas to pot , replace cover and let sit undisturbed for 5 more minutes._ _Add tomatoes and salt and fluff with a fork. Transfer to a serving plate. Top with cilantro._ Serve immediately. 267 73 183 773 _Lentil Pilaf_ Ingredients Required __________ 2 cups lentils, washed thoroughly 8 cups water 1 tablespoon salt 12 cup rice , washed thoroughly 1 cup onion , chopped 14 cup olive oil 14 cup vegetable oil 14 cup vinegar (balsamic perhaps) (optional) __________ _Clean the lentils with fresh cold water to avoid foaming when cooking._ _Mix 2 cups of lentils with the 8 cups of water and 1 tablespoon of salt ._ _Heat on high, uncovered for approximately 30 minutes, mixing slightly every 10 minutes, removing any foam that may have come up._ _After the lentils turn tender and soft (not melted), make sure there is only about 2 cups of water remaining (add or remove water )._ _Add the half cup of rice . Cook for 10 mins at medium fire ._ _Simultaneously with the rice , fry the chopped cup of onion in the olive oil and vegetable oil until golden brown (should be about 10 minutes)._ _After the 10 minutes pass, slowly pour the oil and onion over the lentils and rice . Lower the heat to Low, and let it lay for 10 minutes (do NOT mix)._ _After the 10 minutes pass, add the quarter cup of vinegar and mix everything._ _Cover with a thick clean kitchen towel and leave covered for about 10 minutes._ _After the 15 minutes pass, you should have a thick pilaf of lentils and rice , with onions showing up here and there._ Serve 267 73 183 773 _Lentil Rice Dish (Mujadarah Arabic Dish)_ Ingredients Required __________ 1 cup lentils 13 cup basmati rice 4 cups water or 4 cups vegetable broth salt (to taste) 1 teaspoon cumin 14 cup olive oil or 14 cup vegetable oil 2 large onions , sliced 12 inch slivers __________ _Saute Onions with olive oil(stirring occasionally) until golden brown . Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish._ _Place lentils,water ,salt ,in different saucepan and cook over medium heat for about 20 minutes or until lentils are tender._ _Add to lentils the uncooked rice ,browned onions and cumin and mix. Cover and simmer for another 15 minutes or until water is absorbed and rice is tender._ _Place Lentils Rice dish(mujadarah)in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of browned onions ._ _Mujadarah is best when served with Tomato salad ._ Serve 267 73 183 773 _Spicy Rice , Bean and Lentil Casserole_ Ingredients Required __________ 2 teaspoons vegetable oil 2 -3 garlic cloves, smashed 1 cup chopped onion 34 cup chopped green pepper 3 34 cups vegetable stock 34 cup brown rice 12 cup green lentil 1 teaspoon dried basil 1 teaspoon chili powder 1 (19 ounce) can red kidney beans , rinsed and drained 1 cup canned corn kernels or 1 cup frozen corn kernels, drained 1 cup mild salsa or 1 cup hot salsa __________ _In a non stick saucepan, heat oil over medium high heat._ _Add garlic , onions and green pepper , cook for 3 minutes._ _Stir in stock, brown rice , lentils, basil and chili powder, bring to boil._ _Reduce heat to medium low and cook, covered and stirring occasionally, for 30 to 40 minutes or until rice and lentils are tender and liquid is absorbed._ _Stir in beans, corn and salsa, cover and cook for 5 minutes or until heated through._ Serve 267 73 183 773 Kusherie (Egyptian Rice _ and Lentils)_ Ingredients Required __________ 2 tablespoons oil 1 14 cups lentils 3 cups boiling water (or stock) 1 teaspoon salt 1 dash pepper 1 12 cups rice 1 cup boiling water (or stock) Sauce 34 cup tomato paste 3 cups tomato juice (or tomato sauce or pureed tomatoes ) 1 green pepper , chopped 12 cup celery leaves, chopped 1 tablespoon sweetener 12 teaspoon salt 1 teaspoon cumin 14 teaspoon cayenne pepper Browned Onions 2 tablespoons oil 3 onions , sliced 4 garlic cloves, minced _Directions to Prepare_ __________ _In a large heavy saucepan over medium heat , brown lentils in 2 Tbsp oil, about 5 minutes, stirring often._ _Add the 3 cups boiling stock and the salt and pepper ._ Cook uncovered for 10 minutes over medium heat . Stir in the rice and 1 cup stock. _Bring to boil, reduce heat , cover and simmer 25 minutes without stirring._ Meanwhile make sauce Heat all the sauce ingredients together in a medium saucepan. _Bring to boil, reduce heat , cover and simmer 20-30 minutes._ _To make browned onions , heat oil in a small skillet._ Saute onions and garlic over medium heat till browned. _To serve, put rice lentil mixture on a platter, pour tomato sauce over and top with browned onions ._ Serve

recipes.name: Israeli Rice ğŸ› ğŸŒ¾ ğŸ› ğŸŒ¾ ğŸ› and Lentil Stew with Cumin and Garlic ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„
recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Eggplant    With Raw Garlic   _


Ingredients Required
__________

1 large eggplant  

olive    oil, as needed (extra-virgin preferred)

4 garlic  cloves, peeled and minced fine

2 tablespoons fresh lemon    juice

1 tablespoon extra virgin olive    oil

1 teaspoon salt  

12 cup finely chopped fresh flat leaf parsley


Directions to Prepare
__________

_Wash eggplant    well; cut off stem portion (leave peel on)._

_Slice eggplant    into quarter-inch slices and brush each side with extra virgin olive    oil._

_Heat    a nonstick skillet over medium-high heat    and brown eggplant    slices until they are golden brown on each side._

_On a serving platter, arrange cooked eggplant    slices._

_In a small measuring cup, combine the garlic , lemon    juice, the one tbsp of extra virgin olive    oil and the salt ._

Drizzle over the eggplant    slices, sprinkle with parsley, and serve.

Mashed Potato and Vegetable Fritters
ingredients: Place the diced potatoes in a pot and cover with cold water. Let it boil over high heat.
Once boiling, reduce the heat to medium and let it gently boil for 10-15 minutes, or until potatoes are fork-tender.
Drain the potatoes and put them back in the pot.
Add the garlic, oregano, thyme, salt and mash with a potato masher until you get a smooth and creamy consistency.
Place mashed potatoes in a bowl. Mix in the cashew cheese sauce
You can vary recipe by adding some chopped steamed vegies

recipes.name: Eggplant ğŸ† ğŸ† ğŸ† With Raw Garlic ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„ ğŸ§„
recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Roasted Eggplant    (Aubergine) Spread_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 medium eggplant  

2 red bell peppers , seeded

1 red onion , peeled

2 garlic  cloves, minced

3 tablespoons olive    oil

1 12 teaspoons salt 

1 tablespoon tomato    paste


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat    the oven to 400 degrees F.

Cut the eggplant , bell pepper , and onion    into 1-inch cubes.

Toss them in a large bowl with the garlic , olive    oil, salt .

Spread them on a baking sheet; roast for 45 minutes, until the vegetables are lightly browned and soft, tossing once during cooking.

Cool slightly.

Place the vegetables in a food processor fitted with a steel blade, add the tomato    paste, and pulse 3 or 4 times to blend.

It should still have a lot of texture left, and not completely pureed.

Taste for salt .

Serve

recipes.name: Aloo Baingan/Potato ğŸ¥” ğŸ¥” ğŸ¥” Eggplant ğŸ† ğŸ† ğŸ† Curry
ingredients: Wash the eggplant and cut into small cubes.
Heat some oil in a large pan over medium heat and add the eggplant cubes.
Cook the eggplant cubes for about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally until they are lightly browned.
Crack the eggs into a bowl, whisk until combined and season with salt.
Add the eggs to the pan with the eggplant cubes and stir to combine.
Cook for another 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the eggs are cooked through.
Serve with a side of your favorite vegetables, or enjoy as is.

recipes.name: Creamy Spinach and Potato Soup ğŸ²ğŸ²ğŸ²
ingredients: x 400 g / 14 oz cans crushed tomatoes
x 250 g / 9 oz packets lasagna sheets
Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and sautÃ© until the onion is softened.
Add the oregano and sea salt and stir to combine.
Add the zucchini and sautÃ© for 3 minutes.
Add the spinach and stir until wilted.
In a bowl, mix the ricotta cheese, egg and mozzarella cheese.
Spread a layer of the crushed tomatoes over the bottom of a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Layer the lasagna sheets over the tomatoes.
Spread half of the ricotta cheese mixture over the lasagna sheets.
Top with the spinach and zucchini mixture.
Layer the remaining lasagna sheets over the vegetables.
Spread the remaining ricotta cheese mixture over the lasagna sheets.
Top with the remaining crushed tomatoes.
Bake for 35-40 minutes, or until the lasagna is golden brown and bubbling.
Allow to cool for 10 minutes before serving.
Soak the soya chunks in water for 10 minutes then drain and set aside.
Heat the olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion, garlic, and carrots and cook until softened.
Add the cumin and cooked soya chunks and sautÃ© for 1 minute.
Add the vegetable stock and rice and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer, covered, for 15 minutes.
Add the spinach and season with salt. Stir to combine and cook for 2 minutes more.

ingredients: _This hearty and comforting Vegan Shepherds Pie is packed with savory lentils, flavorful vegetables, and a creamy mashed potato    topping. Perfect for a cozy dinner_
Â½ cup plant-based milk    (almond, oat, or soy-free option)
tbsp vegan butter or olive    oil
Â½ cups cooked lentils (or 1 can, drained and rinsed)
tbsp soy sauce (or coconut    aminos for soy-free)

_Prepare the Mashed Potatoes Boil the potatoes in a large pot of salted  water     for about 15 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain and mash with plant-based milk , vegan butter , salt , pepper, and garlic    powder. Set aside._

_Cook the FillingHeat olive    oil in a large pan over medium heat. SautÃ© onions , carrots , and celery for about 5 minutes. Add garlic  and mushrooms , and cook for another 3 minutes until softened. Stir in the cooked lentils, tomato    paste, soy sauce, thyme, paprika, salt , and pepper. Pour in vegetable broth and let simmer for 5 minutes. Stir in the frozen peas    and corn , then remove from heat ._
_Transfer the filling to a baking dish and spread evenly._
_Spoon the mashed potatoes on top and smooth with a spatula. (Optional) Use a fork    to create texture on the potatoes ._
_Bake for 20-25 minutes until golden brown on top._
Serve  EnjoyLet it cool slightly before serving. Enjoy your delicious and comforting vegan shepherds pie

267 73 183 773 _Italian Salad Dressing_


Ingredients Required
__________

34 cup vegetable oil

14 cup apple     cider vinegar

2 tablespoons water     

1 teaspoon minced garlic    

2 teaspoons sweetener 

1 12 teaspoons salt  

14 teaspoon pepper      

1 teaspoon grated parmesan cheese    


Directions to Prepare
__________

Combine all ingredients in a bottle.

 Shake to blend.

Allow flavors to blend about an hour or so, Will even be more flavorful the following day. Be sure to refrigerate any leftovers.

 Makes about 1 cup.

ingredients: _Mushroom Fried Rice with Apple Cider Vinegar and Ginger_
Heat the oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add the mushrooms and stir-fry for 2 minutes.
Add the ginger and cook for 1 minute.
Add the cooked rice and stir-fry for 3 minutes, or until the rice is heated through.
Add the apple cider vinegar, soy sauce, and salt to taste. Stir-fry for 1 minute.

267 73 183 773 Kusherie (Egyptian Rice _   and Lentils)_


Ingredients Required
__________

2 tablespoons oil

1 14 cups lentils

3 cups boiling water     (or stock)

1 teaspoon salt  

1 dash pepper    

1 12 cups rice  

1 cup boiling water     (or stock)

Sauce

34 cup tomato    paste

3 cups tomato    juice (or tomato    sauce or pureed tomatoes )

1 green pepper , chopped

12 cup celery leaves, chopped

1 tablespoon sweetener 

12 teaspoon salt  

1 teaspoon cumin

14 teaspoon cayenne pepper    

Browned Onions    

2 tablespoons oil

3 onions , sliced

4 garlic  cloves, minced


_Directions to Prepare_
__________

_In a large    heavy saucepan over medium heat , brown lentils in 2 Tbsp oil, about 5 minutes, stirring often._

 _Add the 3 cups boiling stock and the salt  and pepper ._

 Cook uncovered for 10 minutes over medium heat .

 Stir in the rice    and 1 cup stock.

 _Bring to boil, reduce heat , cover and simmer 25 minutes without stirring._

 Meanwhile make sauce Heat    all the sauce ingredients together in a medium saucepan.

 _Bring to boil, reduce heat , cover and simmer 20-30 minutes._

 _To make browned onions , heat oil in a small skillet._

 Saute onions    and garlic    over medium heat    till browned.

 _To serve, put rice    lentil mixture on a platter, pour tomato    sauce over and top with browned onions ._

Serve

267 73 183 773 _Stir-Fry Mushrooms    and Bell Peppers   _


Ingredients Required
__________

2 tablespoons olive   oil

3 green onions   , sliced

3 garlic  cloves, minced

2 bell peppers , deseeded and diced (the colorful the better)

1 cup mushrooms , sliced

2 -3 tablespoons soy sauce

1 teaspoon sesame oil


Directions to Prepare
__________

Heat oil til really hot .

Stir fry onions  (1 minute), then garlic  (20 seconds).

Then add peppers  and mushrooms . Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft, (about 2 minutes).

Add the soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes.

When done, remove from heat    and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve.
