Ingredients
ingredients: Begin by heating the olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the onions and garlic to the pot and cook until softened, about 5 minutes.
Add the eggplant cubes to the pot and cook until lightly browned, about 5-7 minutes.
Add the cumin, paprika, coriander, and turmeric to the pot and stir until the spices are fragrant, about 1-2 minutes.
Pour in the vegetable stock and bring the mixture to a gentle boil.
Add the rice and stir to combine.
Reduce the heat and allow the mixture to simmer gently, covered, for 17-20 minutes until the liquid has been absorbed and the rice is cooked.
Season with salt and pepper to taste, and serve.

ingredients: Mash the bananas in a large bowl.
Break the eggs into the mashed banana and mix them together.
Add the self-raising flour, milk or plant based milk, vegetable oil, sweetener and vanilla extract to the mix and stir until combined.
Heat a non-stick pan over medium-high heat and add a tablespoon of vegetable oil.
When the oil is hot, spoon the batter onto the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes.
Flip the pancakes and cook for a further 2 minutes until golden brown.
Serve with your favourite toppings and enjoy

ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, combine the soya mince, cooked lentils, onion , garlic , carrot , dried oregano, dried basil, dried thyme, salt , breadcrumbs, and egg . Mix everything together until well combined.
Use your hands to form the mixture into small meatballs, about 1-2 tablespoons each.
Heat the olive  oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the meatballs and cook for 5-6 minutes, turning occasionally, until browned on all sides.
Pour in the chopped tomatoes    and vegetable broth, and stir to combine. Bring to a simmer and let cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the meatballs are fully cooked.
Serve the meatballs over your choice of pasta, rice, or quinoa, and top with some of the tomato    sauce. Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious and protein-packed  These meatballs are a great option for vegetarians and are also a healthier alternative to traditional meatballs. They can be served as a main dish or used as a protein-packed addition to salads, sandwiches, and more. Bon appÃ©tit

g chickpeas (soaked overnight and dried) - 20 g fresh basil - 35 g sun-dried tomatoes (dry, not in oil) - 40 g breadcrumbs - 1 Tbsp flax seed meal  2.5 Tbsp water - 2 cloves garlic - olive oil - salt, pepper - tomato sauce - spaghetti
Prepare flax egg in a bowl by mixing flax seed meal with water.
SautÃ© minced garlic with a tbsp of olive oil in a skillet until slightly browned. Cool slightly and add to the bowl with flax egg.
Add 25g breadcrumbs, chopped basil, chopped sun-dried tomatoes, salt, pepper and a tbsp of olive oil. Blend them together.
Add chickpeas, and blend everything together. Grind them well, but do not make it pasty.
Form into balls - about 12 in total. Then roll in additional bread crumbs.
Brown them for about 5 minutes in the skillet with some olive oil, shaking the pan to roll them around to brown all sides.
Put meatballs on a bare baking sheet and transfer to the preheated oven (375F/190C) and bake for 15 minutes.
In the meantime prepare some vegan spaghetti and tomato sauce.
Once meatballs are golden brown, remove from oven. Let cool briefly before serving.

recipes.name: OR
ingredients: Optional toppings shredded cheese, avocado, salsa, sour cream
In a large skillet, heat 1 tbsp of olive oil over medium heat. Add 1 diced onion and 2 minced garlic cloves and cook until softened, about 2-3 minutes.
Add 200g of soya mince to the skillet and cook for about 5 minutes, until browned.
Add 1 tsp of cumin, and 1 tsp of dried oregano to the skillet and stir to combine.
Drain and rinse 200g of lentils and add them to the skillet. Stir to combine with the soya mince mixture.
Pour 1 can of diced tomatoes into the skillet and stir. Let the mixture simmer for 10 minutes, until the liquid has reduced and the lentils are tender.
To assemble the tacos, place a scoop of the soya mince and lentil mixture onto a tortilla. Add desired toppings such as shredded cheese, avocado, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious meal

Tortilla, round, thin, flat bread of Mexico made from unleavened cornmeal or, less commonly, wheat flour. Traditionally, the corn (maize) for tortillas was boiled with unslaked lime to soften the kernels and loosen the hulls. (This lime was the principal source of calcium in the Mexican diet.)

267 73 183 773 _Roasted Eggplant    (Aubergine) Spread_


Ingredients Required
__________

1 medium eggplant  

2 red bell peppers , seeded

1 red onion , peeled

2 garlic  cloves, minced

3 tablespoons olive    oil

1 12 teaspoons salt 

1 tablespoon tomato    paste


Directions to Prepare
__________

Preheat    the oven to 400 degrees F.

Cut the eggplant , bell pepper , and onion    into 1-inch cubes.

Toss them in a large bowl with the garlic , olive    oil, salt .

Spread them on a baking sheet; roast for 45 minutes, until the vegetables are lightly browned and soft, tossing once during cooking.

Cool slightly.

Place the vegetables in a food processor fitted with a steel blade, add the tomato    paste, and pulse 3 or 4 times to blend.

It should still have a lot of texture left, and not completely pureed.

Taste for salt .

Serve

ingredients: _Mango Coconut Overnight Oats with Vegan Yogurt_
cup coconut milk (or any plant-based milk)
Optional toppings sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
In a medium-sized bowl, mix together the rolled oats, coconut milk, and vegan yogurt until well combined.
Add in the diced mango, chia seeds, and shredded coconut. Stir well to evenly distribute all the ingredients.
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap or transfer the mixture into an airtight container.
Place the bowl or container in the refrigerator and let the oats soak overnight, or for at least 6-8 hours.
In the morning, give the oats a quick stir. If the mixture is too thick, you can add more coconut milk or water to achieve your desired consistency.
Transfer the oat mixture into serving bowls or jars. Top with sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and a drizzle of honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
Enjoy your delicious and nutritious for a quick and easy breakfast or snack option.
You can use any type of vegan yogurt for this recipe, such as almond or coconut yogurt.
If you prefer a sweeter taste, you can add a bit more honey or maple syrup to the oats before soaking overnight.
The chia seeds and shredded coconut add extra fiber and healthy fats, but you can omit them if desired.
For a tropical twist, you can also add some diced pineapple or banana to the oats.
This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled to make multiple servings for meal prep.
You can also use frozen mango if fresh is not available, just make sure to let it thaw before adding it to the oat mixture.

267 73 183 773 6 Healthy Homemade Salad      Dressings

_These six healthy salad dressing recipes are easy to make and store in your fridge. Try them all or choose your favorites  balsamic, peanut    ginger, apple   cider vinegar, avocado, raspberry  vinaigrette, and honey  mustard salad    dressing._

_Six colorful jars of homemade salad dressing surrounded with vegetables and fruit._

_6 Healthy Salad    Dressings Overview_

Have you ever wondered how you could make your favorite salad dressings in a healthy, more affordable version This post shares 6 healthy salad      dressing recipes that are packed full of nutrition and easy to make

_These salad    dressing recipes are so simple and easy to make. Once you try a few of these recipes youll quickly learn which ones are your favorites and what dishes youd like to pair them with._

These recipes arent just great for salads  You can use them in quinoa bowls, on top of roasted veggies, pasta dishes, or even as a marinade

_All of these dressings are made with whole natural ingredients that youll feel good about sharing with your family. Each recipe makes about 1 Â½ cups, which is the perfect size to store in 8 oz mason jars._

A jar of apple   cider vinegar dressing with ingredients including olive    oil, apple   cider vinegar, dijon mustard, garlic , salt  and pepper.

1. Apple   Cider Vinegar Salad      Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 cup olive    oil

Â½ cup apple   cider vinegar

Â½ Tbsp dijon mustard

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

DIRECTIONS

Combine 1 cup olive    oil, Â½ cup apple   cider vinegar, Â½ Tbsp dijon mustard, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt  and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar.

_Seal the lid and shake up to mix. This dressing can be stored in the fridge for up to two weeks. Reshake before using again._

A jar of balsamic dressing with ingredients listed including balsamic vinegar, olive    oil, honey , dijon mustard, garlic , salt , pepper.

2. Balsamic Salad     Dressing Recipe

INGREDIENTS

Â¾ cup balsamic vinegar

Â½ cup olive    oil

1 Tbsp honey  or pure maple syrup

1 tsp dijon mustard

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

_DIRECTIONS Combine Â¾ cup balsamic vinegar, Â½ cup olive    oil, 1 Tbsp honey , 1 tsp dijon mustard, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt  and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar._

Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

_A mason jar of peanut    butter dressing with ingredients listed beside peanut    butter, soy sauce, lemon    juice, honey , ginger root , and garlic ._

3. Peanut    Butter    Salad    Dressing

INGREDIENTS

Â½ cup peanut    butter  or almond butter

3 Tbsp soy sauce

2 Tbsp honey   or maple syrup

2 Tbsp lemon    juice

Â½ Tbsp freshly grated ginger    

1 garlic  clove  minced

DIRECTIONS Combine Â½ cup peanut    butter, 3 tbsp soy sauce, 2 Tbsp honey , 2 Tbsp lemon    juice, Â½ Tbsp freshly grated ginger , and 1 minced garlic  clove together in a container or mason jar. Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

A jar of creamy avocado    dressing with a sliced avocado beside it. Ingredients are listed beside include avocado , cilantro, olive    oil, lime    juice, water , garlic , salt  and pepper.

4. Creamy Avocado    Salad Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 ripe avocado   peeled and pitted

Â½ cup water     

Â½ cup chopped cilantro

Â¼ cup olive    oil

Â¼ cup lime  juice

1 garlic  clove  minced

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

The instructions for this dressing are below

_DIRECTIONS Add 1 ripe avocado , Â½ cup water , Â½ cup chopped cilantro, Â¼ cup olive    oil, Â¼ cup lime  juice, 1 minced garlic  clove, Â½ tsp salt , and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper all to a blender and blend until smooth and creamy._

Pour into a container or mason jar. Store in the fridge for up to 3-4 days. Re-shake the jar before using it again.

A jar of honey  mustard salad    dressing and ingredients listed including olive    oil, lemon  juice, dijon mustard, honey  salt  and pepper.

5. Honey  Mustard Salad    Dressing

INGREDIENTS

1 cup olive    oil

Â½ cup lemon  juice

2 Tbsp dijon mustard

2 Tbsp honey  

Â½ tsp salt  

Â¼ tsp ground black pepper

DIRECTIONS Combine 1 cup olive    oil, Â½ cup lemon  juice, 2 Tbsp dijon mustard, 2 Tbsp honey , Â½ tsp salt , and Â¼ tsp ground black pepper in a container or mason jar.

_Seal the lid and shake up to mix. Store in the fridge for up to two weeks. Re-shake the jar before using it again._

A mason jar of raspberry  vinaigrette with a bowl of fresh raspberries and a list of ingredients including raspberries , olive  oil, lemon  juice, apple   cider vinegar, honey  and salt .

6. Raspberry Vinaigrette

INGREDIENTS

1 cup fresh raspberries

Â¼ cup olive    oil

Â¼ cup lemon  juice

3 Tbsp apple   cider vinegar

1 Tbsp honey  or pure maple syrup

Â¼ tsp salt  

The instructions for this dressing are below

_DIRECTIONS Add 1 cup fresh raspberries, Â¼ cup olive oil, Â¼ cup lemon juice, 3 Tbsp apple cider vinegar, 1 Tbsp honey and Â¼ tsp salt to a blender and blend until smooth. Pour over salad. This dressing is best when served fresh._

recipes.name: Moroccan Chickpea and Okra Stew
ingredients: _Spicy Okra and Tomato Curry with Caramelized Onions_
tip of a teaspoon of cayenne pepper
Begin by washing and drying 500 grams of okra. Remove the tops and tips of the okra and cut them into 1-inch pieces.

Heat 2 tablespoons of vegetable oil in a large pan over medium heat. Add the okra and cook for 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they start to brown. Remove the okra from the pan and set aside.
In the same pan, add 2 large sliced onions and cook on low heat for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are caramelized.
While the onions are caramelizing, chop 400 grams of tomatoes into small pieces. Crush 2 cloves of garlic and grate 1 tablespoon of ginger.
Once the onions are caramelized, add the garlic and ginger to the pan and cook for 1-2 minutes.
Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook for 5-7 minutes until they start to break down.
Add 1 teaspoon each of cumin, coriander, turmeric, and cayenne pepper to the pan and mix well.
Return the okra to the pan and stir everything together. Add salt to taste.
Cover the pan and let the curry simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, until the okra is tender.
Once the okra is cooked, remove the lid and let the curry cook for an additional 5 minutes to thicken.
Garnish with fresh coriander leaves and serve.
Enjoy the delicious and flavorful combination of spicy okra and sweet caramelized onions

To create a superb side of soft, caramelized roasted mushrooms, use simple, simple ingredients.

And were here to demonstrate it When mushrooms are oven-roasted at high temperatures for a brief period of time, the water is able to escape, leaving behind soft, melt-in-your-mouth interiors and golden-brown caramelized exteriors. Youll find earthy, meaty, herbaceous, and crave-worthy bits of flavor in this recipe for roasted mushrooms. They just require eight ingredients and are quick, simple, and extremely tasty. These are vegan and paleo-friendly, making them the ideal savory side for all dietary requirements We also enjoy dry-sautÃ© mushrooms, even though roasting them is the simplest way to prepare them and intensify their flavor.
Are Roasted Mushrooms Good For You

Oven roasted mushrooms are super underrated Not only are they earthy, savory, and meaty but also are packed with nutrients Roasted mushrooms in the oven are generally low in calories and fat and are great to bulk up a meal. They contain Vitamin D, riboflavin, potassium and are a good source of fiber Some experts even say that roast mushrooms can help boost your immune system, have anti-cancer properties, and lower your blood pressure due to their antioxidants
How Do You Keep Mushrooms From Getting Soggy In The Oven

is one of the most common questions we get asked No one likes soggy, slimy mushrooms and so were here to give you all the tips and tricks, for tender, flavorful mushrooms oven roasted with toasty, crispy exteriors
Gently clean your mushrooms with a paper towel rather than running them under cold water.

Since mushrooms are a high water content food, meaning that their sponge-like structure allows for water to be released during cooking, we recommend that if juices pool halfway through baking, drain them off the tray so they continue to roast instead of steam.
When in doubt, salt after, prevents the water from being released more rapidly during cooking.
Oven-roasted mushrooms can go with just about any dish theyre extremely versatile, light yet still hearty

Sprinkle them over our Creamy Mashed Potatoes and Green Bean Almondine. Add them to Alfredo Sauce or Homemade Marinara to bulk up the sauce. They also go great with pasta such as Vegan Cauliflower Gnocchi, Sausage Kale Pasta with Lemon Cream Sauce, or Creamy Roasted Red Pepper Pasta. There are so many ways to devour roasted mushrooms but our favorite way is straight from the baking sheet.

Prep For our roasted mushrooms recipe, we use cremini mushrooms but you can make it your own and roast portobello, shiitake, or button mushrooms  whatever you have available Cut into quarters and drizzle with olive oil and salt Pro tip place them cut-side down in a single layer to get that crispy bottom

Cook Youll do this in two iterations at 450F. First, cook them for 10 minutes. They might start to release some water so now is a great time to remove the liquid from the rimmed baking sheet. Add in the garlic and thyme halfway through so it doesnt burn Toss them and then return them to a single layer, preferably on the other cut side for optimal golden-brown color
Garnish with fresh parsley and enjoy Roast mushrooms will become caramelized on the outside and soft on the inside
Tools Youll Need For Roasted Mushrooms
Â½ pounds cremini mushrooms, trimmed, quartered
Â¼ cup flat leaf parsley, finely chopped
Place the mushrooms on a rimmed sheet pan. Drizzle with olive oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Toss to coat.

Spread the mushrooms out in a single layer and bake for 10 minutes. Remove from the oven, add the garlic and thyme and toss to combine. Place back in the oven and continue to cook until the mushrooms are caramelized and soft, about 10 more minutes.
Remove from the oven and toss with parsley before serving.

ingredients: Prepare the soya chunks by soaking them in hot water for 10 minutes. Drain and squeeze out excess water    from the chunks. Set aside.
Heat a large pan over medium-high heat    and add in the vegetable oil.
Finely chop the garlic    cloves and dice the onion    and red bell pepper .
Add the chopped garlic    to the pan and stir-fry for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add in the diced onion    and bell pepper    and stir-fry for another 2 minutes.
Add in the prepared soya chunks and continue stir-frying for 3-4 minutes until they start to turn slightly golden.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, oyster sauce, and sesame oil. Pour this mixture over the soya chunks and vegetables in the pan.
Continue stir-frying for another 2-3 minutes until the soya chunks are fully coated in the sauce and the vegetables are tender.
Remove from heat and serve hot . You can enjoy this dish on its own as a protein-packed meal or serve it with rice or traditional meal for a more filling meal.

In the morning, give the oats a quick stir. If the mixture is too thick, you can add more coconut milk or water to achieve your desired consistency.
Transfer the oat mixture into serving bowls or jars. Top with sliced almonds, extra diced mango, and a drizzle of honey (or maple syrup) for sweetness.
Enjoy your delicious and nutritious for a quick and easy breakfast or snack option.
You can use any type of vegan yogurt for this recipe, such as almond or coconut yogurt.
If you prefer a sweeter taste, you can add a bit more honey or maple syrup to the oats before soaking overnight.
The chia seeds and shredded coconut add extra fiber and healthy fats, but you can omit them if desired.
For a tropical twist, you can also add some diced pineapple or banana to the oats.
This recipe can be easily doubled or tripled to make multiple servings for meal prep.
You can also use frozen mango if fresh is not available, just make sure to let it thaw before adding it to the oat mixture.

ingredients: Place the diced potatoes in a pot and cover with cold water. Let it boil over high heat.

Add the garlic, oregano, thyme, salt and mash with a potato masher until you get a smooth and creamy consistency.
Place mashed potatoes in a bowl. Mix in the cashew cheese sauce
You can vary recipe by adding some chopped steamed vegies

recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Mushroom    Risotto_


Ingredients Required
__________

2 onions , finely chopped

200 g mushrooms , chopped (or more if you like them)

2 cups  rice    

1 liter vegetable stock 

1 cup cheese    

oil


Directions to Prepare
__________

Heat oil in pan, add onions    and mushrooms .

 Cook until onions    are soft.

 Add rice , stir until combined.

 Put stock in another pan and boil.

 Stir in 23 cup stock to the rice .

 Stir until all absorbed.

 Continue adding stock in small amounts in this fashion until all used.

 When this process is finished, add cheese.

 Serve

recipes.notes:
267 73 183 773 _Stir-Fry Mushrooms    and Bell Peppers   _


Ingredients Required
__________

2 tablespoons olive   oil

3 green onions   , sliced

3 garlic  cloves, minced

2 bell peppers , deseeded and diced (the colorful the better)

1 cup mushrooms , sliced

2 -3 tablespoons soy sauce

1 teaspoon sesame oil


Directions to Prepare
__________

Heat oil til really hot .

Stir fry onions  (1 minute), then garlic  (20 seconds).

Then add peppers  and mushrooms . Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft, (about 2 minutes).

Add the soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes.

When done, remove from heat    and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve.

Heat the vegetable oil in a large wok or frying pan over medium heat, add the minced garlic and diced onion and cook for about 5 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the mushrooms and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Add the cooked rice, soy sauce, honey, apple cider vinegar and chili flakes (if using) and mix everything together.
Reduce the heat to low and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Add the frozen peas and cook for a further 5 minutes.
Finally, add the spring onions and mix everything together.

recipes.name: Welcome to Healthy By Nature (HBN) vegetarian kitchen
ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, combine the soya mince, cooked lentils, onion , garlic , carrot , dried oregano, dried basil, dried thyme, salt , breadcrumbs, and egg . Mix everything together until well combined.
Use your hands to form the mixture into small meatballs, about 1-2 tablespoons each.
Heat the olive  oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the meatballs and cook for 5-6 minutes, turning occasionally, until browned on all sides.
Pour in the chopped tomatoes    and vegetable broth, and stir to combine. Bring to a simmer and let cook for 15-20 minutes, or until the sauce has thickened and the meatballs are fully cooked.
Serve the meatballs over your choice of pasta, rice, or quinoa, and top with some of the tomato    sauce. Garnish with chopped parsley, if desired.
